definition: composed of many distinct individuals united to form a whole or colony, a resident of a colony
details:
adjective
- composed of many distinct individuals united to form a whole or colony
= example: composed of many distinct individuals united to form a whole or colony
= synonyms: compound
- of or relating to or characteristic of or inhabiting a colony
- of animals who live in colonies, such as ants
noun
- a resident of a colony
